suits.name: Abomination
suits.description: A jumpsuit with the "Abomination" colourscheme.

suits.name: Bouncer
suits.description: A jumpsuit with the "Bouncer" colourscheme & "NO SKIN" badge icon.

suits.name: Candlebearer
suits.description: A jumpsuit with the "Candlebearer" colourscheme.

suits.name: Candlebrute
suits.description: A jumpsuit with the "Candlebrute" colourscheme.

suits.name: Chainsmoker
suits.description: A jumpsuit with the "Chiansmoker" colourscheme.

suits.name: Deep Sea Bunny
suits.description: A jumpsuit with the "Deep Sea Bunny" colourscheme.

suits.name: DiVine
suits.description: A jumpsuit with the "DiVine" colourscheme. Vines included!

suits.name: Eyefestation
suits.description: A jumpsuit with the "Eyefestation" colourscheme.

suits.name: Enraged Eyefestation
suits.description: A jumpsuit with "Enraged Eyefestation's" colourscheme.

suits.name: Outraged Eyefestation
suits.description: A jumpsuit with "Outraged Eyefestation's" colourscheme.

suits.name: Firewall
suits.description: A jumpsuit given to contestants of the Hematogångeld. The suit has been specifically designed to be as sleek as possible, allowing for easy movement.

suits.name: Good People
suits.description: A jumpsuit with the "Good People" colourscheme. Rotten Z-96 mask as icons included.

suits.name: Lopee
suits.description: A recreation of the suit that "Mr. Lopee" wears.

suits.name: Pandemonium
suits.description: A jumpsuit with the "Pandemonium" colourscheme.

suits.name: Pinkie
suits.description: A jumpsuit with the "Pinkie" colourscheme.

suits.name: Pipsqueak
suits.description: A jumpsuit with the "Pipsqueak" colourscheme.

suits.name: Searchlights
suits.description: A jumpsuit with the "Searchlights" colourscheme.

suits.name: Skelepede
suits.description: A jumpsuit with the "Skelepede" colourscheme. They killed him....

suits.name: Rebarb
suits.description: A jumpsuit with the "Rebarb" colourscheme. The blood isn't yours.

suits.name: Squiddle
suits.description: A jumpsuit with the "Squiddle" colourscheme.

suits.name: Void
suits.description: A jumpsuit with the "Void" colourscheme.

suits.name: Wall Dweller
suits.description: A jumpsuit with the "Wall Dweller" colourscheme. Trypophobia now included.

suits.name: Clown
suits.description: A clown jumpsuit. Squeaky shoes included.

suits.name: Drawing
suits.description: wow this is ugly. did a child draw this? they should stop pursuing art. god this is is so awful i hate looking at this.

suits.name: Ink
suits.description: Given to the EXR-P who work faster than their peirs.

suits.name: Nightfall
suits.description: A jumpsuit with the "Nightfall" colourscheme. His rotten face as icons included.

suits.name: Night Guard
suits.description: Let's go kill some kids!

suits.name: Painter
suits.description: To thank you for helping them escape, Sebastian and Painter found this old painting uniform in Sebastian's closet and gave it to you! They're both so thankful for your assistance, and will be your best of friends for the rest of time!

suits.name: Ranger
suits.description: A jumpsuit based off of the heroes of the heroes within the California military. Cool helmet & visor not included.

suits.name: Red Clown
suits.description: A red clown jumpsuit. Squeaky shoes included.

suits.name: Ridge Worker
suits.description: A jumpsuit worn by the MR-P who work within the Ridge.

suits.name: Scribble
suits.description: wow this is ugly. did a child draw this? they should stop pursuing art. god this is is so awful i hate looking at this.

suits.name: Sebastian's Outfit
suits.description: Give em hell!

suits.name: Skeleton
suits.description: An attempt to bypass the Z-564's guarding The Raveyard. They were, unfortunatly, able to see through the facade.

suits.name: USHA
suits.description: The standard issue "Urbanshade Safety and Health Administration" uniform. This department was olbiterated by an orbital strike in 2012 due to poor safety standards.

suits.name: EXR-P
suits.description: The default EXR-P jumpsuit. Each jumpsuit is outfitted with a thin layer of kevlar, carbon, rubber & fabric, meaning that if the current wearer is to die, the suit can easily be recovered with minimal damage and be reused.

suits.name: Green
suits.description: A green variant of the default EXR-P uniform.

suits.name: Grey
suits.description: A grey variant of the default EXR-P uniform.

suits.name: Orange
suits.description: An orange variant of the default EXR-P uniform.

suits.name: Purple
suits.description: A purple variant of the default EXR-P uniform.

suits.name: Red
suits.description: A red variant of the default EXR-P uniform.

suits.name: White
suits.description: A white variant of the default EXR-P uniform.
If you beg hard enough, she will free you from your 3-dimensional form.

suits.name: A-0 Expedition
suits.description: A jumpsuit worn by the MR-P who are designated A-0 expeditionees.

suits.name: Backrooms Expedition
suits.description: A jumpsuit worn by the LR-P who are designated Backrooms expeditionees.

suits.name: Bloodbag
suits.description: A jumpsuit worn by the LR-P with the "O negative" bloodtype.

suits.name: Bloom
suits.description: A variant of the jumpsuit sworn by the MR-P who work in the oxygen gardens.

suits.name: Bubblegum
suits.description: A formerly white jumpsuit that got mixed up in the laundry. Urbanshade officials brushed this blunder aside and decided to pass it off as an intentional design choice.

suits.name: Bulwark
suits.description: Worn by a MR-P that intentionally sabotaged one of Urbanshade cargo carriers. Security footage indicated that this individual moved with great swiftness... and greater purpose.

suits.name: Calculator
suits.description: A jumpsuit worn by the LR-P afflicted with the rot during the course of their duties.

suits.name: Candy Corn
suits.description: A jumpsuit worn by the LR-P who are assigned to candy taste testing. Due to the obscene mortality rate, this suit is in abundance.

suits.name: Caretaker
suits.description: A jumpsuit worn by the MR-P who are assigned to taking care of Z-17

suits.name: Chales
suits.description: Originally a custom one-of-a-kind request by an MR-P who had bought and redeemed a "Custom Suit Voucher", a mistype accidentaly had 10000 instead of 1 made. Now we need to get rid of them somehow.

suits.name: Chief
suits.description: Worn by an MR-P that out shined and out raked his fellow prisoners in battle earning the "Master" rank at the end of his period at Urbanshade.

suits.name: Clear Skies
suits.description: A jumpsuit worn by the MR-P who work in the oxygen gardens.

suits.name: Coated
suits.description: An experimented jumpsuit coated with a substance meant to protect the user from the Void Mass. It was deemed a success but it failed in protecting its user.

suits.name: Crowbar
suits.description: A jumpsuit worn by the MR-P who work with Z-2.

suits.name: Crownless
suits.description: I wanna be number one. How's that? Short and simple enough for you? It's gonna be a long, hard road. But who knows? Could kick butt... Could be dangerous. Could totally suck. Whaddaya say, bro? Join me. Let's see how far we can take this. And for you there behind the screen right now... Just walk into the submarine. Let the bloodshed begin.

suits.name: Dead Air
suits.description: A jumpsuit worn by the MR-P who work with radio communications.

suits.name: Determined
suits.description: Jumpsuit

suits.name: Double Rotors
suits.description: I miss my wife. I miss her a lot. I'll be back.

suits.name: Egghead
suits.description: NO Laughing NO Singing NO Plants NO Music NO Books NO Exercise NO Pets NO Fun NO Healthy Foods

suits.name: Electrical Hazard
suits.description: A jumpsuit worn by the MR-P who work with electronic equipment & other electrical hazards.

suits.name: Fashionista
suits.description: A jumpsuit worn by the MR-P who design the jumpsuits for thier fellow prisoners.

suits.name: Fire Hazard
suits.description: A jumpsuit worn by the LR-P who work with explosive waste & other fire hazards.

suits.name: Fisher Man
suits.description: A jumpsuit worn by the MR-P who fish for the Blacksite meals.

suits.name: Funky
suits.description: A jumpsuit designed for LR-P used to test Urbanshade's experimental teleportation technology. Although not much has come from those tests, not much aside from LR-P ending up embedded into walls, anyway.

suits.name: Funnybone
suits.description: heh

suits.name: Grayson
suits.description: A jumpsuit worn by the MR-P who work with transportation & logistics.

suits.name: Greener Grass
suits.description: A variant of the jumpsuit sworn by the MR-P who work in the oxygen gardens.

suits.name: Guardian
suits.description: A jumpsuit worn by the MR-P who aid with protection details related to Z-931.

suits.name: Hazmat
suits.description: A jumpsuit worn by the MR-P who work in radioactive areas. Despite its name, the jumpsuit provides no additional radiation resistance, as the mask that would usually go along will not be provided.

suits.name: Happy Dance
suits.description: A jumpsuit worn by the MR-P who make music.

suits.name: HEV
suits.description: A jumpsuit worn by the MR-P who work with Z-2.

suits.name: Hollow
suits.description: A jumpsuit worn by the MR-P who are assigned with Z-1799 in Sleepy Hollow.

suits.name: Holy
suits.description: A jumpsuit worn by the MR-P who work with the "Guardian Angel of the Banlands" blood pump systems.

suits.name: Ice Cream
suits.description: A jumpsuit worn by the LR-P who are assigned to Ice Cream flavour testing. Due to the obscene mortality rate, this suit is in abundance.

suits.name: Impatient
suits.description: A jumpsuit worn by the MR-P who are given extra shifts due to their productivity, as they work faster than others.

suits.name: Kiwi
suits.description: Notably, this has been the only instance of a counterfeit suit becoming part of Urbanshade's wider selection catalog. Not much is known of its origin, but it is thought to have been made custom-made by an MR-P. How it ended up catching Urbanshade's attention in the first place is another story.

suits.name: Knight
suits.description: A jumpsuit worn by the MR-P who are designated Dark World expeditionees.

suits.name: March
suits.description: A suit worn by LR-P tasked with maintaining and caring for a small farm down in the blacksite. LR-P in this position were noted to being pleasantly surprised for having ended up in this position.

suits.name: Marine
suits.description: A jumpsuit worn by the MR-P who are designated to take care of the Deep Sea Bunnies.

suits.name: Mechanic
suits.description: A jumpsuit worn by the EXR-P who perform Blacksite maintenance. They're constantly at war with those who wear the "Technican" suits , fighting over who can get the quartley "Best Performance" bonus.

suits.name: Nails
suits.description: A suit worn by an MR-P infamous for her skills in infiltration, espionage and her infatuation for shiny gems and precious stones.

suits.name: Newbie
suits.description: A jumpsuit worn by the MR-P who are LOSERS and are not good at anything what-so-ever.

suits.name: Newcomer
suits.description: wanna be friends?

suits.name: Noodles
suits.description: A jumpsuit worn by the MR-P who are assigned to noodle taste testing.

suits.name: Obsessed
suits.description: A jumpsuit worn by the LR-P, as a warning for others, as the wearers are prone to incredible amounts of violence.

suits.name: Parale
suits.description: The LR-P that wore this suit was strikingly efficient at swimming up currents.

suits.name: Phazon
suits.description: Jumpsuit

suits.name: Pinkman
suits.description: Why are you blue???

suits.name: Rainbow
suits.description: More so a gradient than a rainbow, actually.

suits.name: Relic
suits.description: man this suit is so cool

suits.name: Repeater
suits.description: A jumpsuit worn by the MR-P tasked with Z-5234's containment superstructure maintenance.

suits.name: Rotten Tree
suits.description: A variant of the jumpsuit sworn by the MR-P who work in the oxygen gardens.

suits.name: Runner
suits.description: A suit worn by LR-P who were used as bait to lure in monsters back into their containment cells. This suit has become infamous as those who bare these colors are not long for this world.

suits.name: Saiyan
suits.description: A jumpsuit customized to resemble the garments used by the Strongest Under The Heavens. It was once said his power level surpassed 9000. Even now, you can feel his power radiating through it.

suits.name: Salmon
suits.description: Due to an slip-up in the laundry process, these white suits we're accidentally turned pink.

suits.name: Slaughterer
suits.description: Originally a custom one-of-a-kind request by an LR-P who had bought and redeemed a "Custom Suit Voucher", after always coming back from any task assinged to them.

suits.name: Songbird
suits.description: Not much is known about this specific jumpsuit scheme. An Urbanshade HR had been noted as commenting 'How can we make this about Cyberpunk?' regarding this suit.

suits.name: Stardust
suits.description: A jumpsuit that has been rumored to have been forged using the essence of a tyrant who ruled over the moon with an iron fist.

suits.name: Stargazer
suits.description: A jumpsuit utilized in the preliminary phases of a currently undisclosed space craft project Urbanshade was involved in.

suits.name: Statistic
suits.description: The original draft for the EXR-P suit, was scrapped due to not fitting the colourscheme of the Blacksite.

suits.name: Sunburn
suits.description: A jumpsuit worn by the LR-P who work during Daybreaks.

suits.name: Survivor
suits.description: Worn by LR-P tasked with carrying and manning Urbanshade's cargo carriers. Following an incident, these LR-P units were tasked with surviving in previously uncharted territory until Urbanshade could send extraction teams to rescue those who remained. And so they left, with new orders and less answers.

suits.name: Swag
suits.description: man this suit is so cool

suits.name: Swampee
suits.description: A jumpsuit worn by the LR-P who work within the Dead Marsh.

suits.name: Swarm
suits.description: A jumpsuit worn by the LR-P who extract honey from Z-724.

suits.name: Tag
suits.description: A jumpsuit worn by the MR-P who are designated for laser weaponry testing.

suits.name: Technician
suits.description: A jumpsuit worn by the EXR-P who perform Blacksite maintenance. They're constantly at war with those who wear the "Mechanic" suits , fighting over who can get the quartley "Best Performance" bonus.

suits.name: Template
suits.description: description here

suits.name: Test Subject
suits.description: A jumpsuit worn by the LR-P who are designated for human testing & experimentation.

suits.name: Thorn
suits.description: A variant of the jumpsuit sworn by the MR-P who work in the oxygen gardens.

suits.name: Toy Soldier
suits.description: A jumpsuit worn by the LR-P who work with Z-2512.

suits.name: Twilight
suits.description: A jumpsuit given to the poor souls who have seen beyond The Black Trees. This jumpsuit is embedded with a soft layer of dust, as to calm the nerves and prevent the spread of the roots.

suits.name: Ultimate Lifeform
suits.description: A jumpsuit that was located on a derelict space station that had been abandoned for 50 years.

suits.name: Urban Legend
suits.description: You were supposed to be a hero, Brian!

suits.name: Vapor
suits.description: A stylistic jumpsuit coloured with classic vaporwave colours.

suits.name: Variant
suits.description: A good jumpsuit.

suits.name: Vault
suits.description: An EXR-P designed to withstand the nuclear apocalypse. Whilst the suit itself can handle a nuclear detonation, the wearer cannot.

suits.name: Wariant
suits.description: An even better jumpsuit.

suits.name: Watermelon
suits.description: Originally a custom one-of-a-kind request by an MR-P who bought and redeemed a "Custom Suit Voucher". This design had become very popular among other MR-P's, leading to its mass reproduction and now exists in abundant quantity.

suits.name: Wet Carpet
suits.description: A jumpsuit worn by the MR-P who help employees with decorations & furnitureing.

suits.name: Yakuri
suits.description: Worn by a MR-P who was the former chairman of a now disbanded crime organization. He is infamous for his unparalleled hand-to-hand combat skills and his equally as powerful singing voice.

suits.name: Zum Zum
suits.description: Originally a custom one-of-a-kind request by an MR-P who had bought and redeemed a "Custom Suit Voucher", other MR-P's loved the design and requested the same thing. It is now in abundance.

suits.name: Øde
suits.description: A jumpsuit worn by the MR-P who manage surface cleanup duties.

suits.name: Beetle
suits.description: Beetle Beetle Beetle

suits.name: Choking
suits.description: Spouting, Splashing, Soaking. Innards, Ingest, Invoking. Nailing, Never, Stops the Choking

suits.name: Frankenstein
suits.description: A jumpsuit comprised of the tatters of other previous jumpsuits. It's alive!

suits.name: Ghost Pumpkin
suits.description: (In a ghastly voice) No! I don't want that!

suits.name: Glove
suits.description: By any means neccessary, it is of upmost importance to NOT fall asleep around anyone wearing this suit.

suits.name: Haunter
suits.description: A jumpsuit designed to replicate the ghosts in limbo. Commissioned during an experiment to disguise a living person as a ghost, in an attempt to sneak into heaven. To no-one's surprise, it didn't work.

suits.name: Killer
suits.description: A jumpsuit worn by the LR-P who are tasked with killing the employee's of Area 51.

suits.name: Mean & Green
suits.description: Instead of fabric, this clothing is made of calcium.

suits.name: Mummy
suits.description: A heavily decayed jumpsuit, wrapped in linen to halt said decay.

suits.name: Old
suits.description: An old and rotten jumpsuit, pulled from the corpses of the Raven Trenches. Most diseases have been cleaned off so it may be worn again. Most.

suits.name: Pumpkin
suits.description: No! I don't want that!

suits.name: Vampire
suits.description: A suit designed for the specific sub-group of EXR-P's who drink blood.

suits.name: Zombie
suits.description: Brainz

suits.name: Aurek
suits.description: A jumpsuit with the "Aurek Team" colourscheme. Murch's helmet as an icon included.

suits.name: Pleasant
suits.description: oh, thats a really pleasant gradiant :)

suits.name: Blue SCAV
suits.description: Shorter Description

suits.name: Grey SCAV
suits.description: Shorter Description

suits.name: SCAV
suits.description: Shorter Description

suits.name: Devil Darling
suits.description: It would appear your performance has gained you the favor of one of Urbanshade's closest collaborators... Whether that is a good thing or not is up to you.

suits.name: Early Bird
suits.description: A suit that seemingly manifested itself in front of the first personnel that took part of the Expendable protocol. How fortunate!

suits.name: Educator
suits.description: A jumpsuit with "The Educator" colourscheme. His face as icons included.

suits.name: Hunter
suits.description: This suit is worth a million bucks!
